titles.title: Talk About Jesus, He's My Rock

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Talk about Jesus, He's my Rock.
Talk about Jesus, He's my Rock.
Talk about Jesus, He's my Rock.
And I know He lives within me
And I know He walks beside me
He's my Rock.
He's my Rock.
He's my Rock.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ezekiel saw Him standing
Standing in the middle of the wheel
John wrote about Him in the book of the seven seals
They call Him the Rose of Sharon
They call Him the lily of the field
But I call Him Jesus
He's my Rock.
He's my Rock.
He's my Rock.
